channel.title: CVE Feed for Metagauss -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Metagauss -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-51544|2024-06-04T12:27:32.353Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Improper Control of Interaction Frequency vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-2951|2024-03-26T18:03:41.675Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-5453|2024-06-05T07:34:55.724Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid â€“ User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the pm_dismissible_notice and pm_wizard_update_group_icon functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.6. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to change arbitrary options to the value '1' or change group icons.
